targets.expr:
sum by (name, component) (

  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
          jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap"}
             * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"),
          "name", 
          "$1", 
          "instance", 
          "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "01_jvm_heap_used", "", ""
  )

  or

  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
          (jvm_memory_committed_bytes{area="heap"} - jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap"})
             * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"),
          "name",
          "$1",
          "instance",
          "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "02_jvm_heap_free", "", ""
  )

  or 

  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
          jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap"}
             * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"),
          "name", 
          "$1", 
          "instance", 
          "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "03_jvm_nonheap_used", "", ""
  )

  or

  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
          (jvm_memory_committed_bytes{area="nonheap"} - jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap"})
             * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"),
          "name",
          "$1",
          "instance",
          "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "04_jvm_nonheap_free", "", ""
  )



  ############################################################
  # 03 — ROCKSDB BLOCK CACHE
  ############################################################

  or
  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
        (rocksdb_shared_cache_block_cache_usage{} * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)")),
        "name", 
        "$1", 
        "instance", 
        "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "05_rocksdb_block_cache", "", ""
  )

  ############################################################
  # 04 — ROCKSDB INDEX/FILTER
  ############################################################

  or
  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
        (kafka_stream_state_estimate_table_readers_mem{} * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)")),
        "name", 
        "$1", 
        "instance", 
        "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "06_rocksdb_index_filter", "", ""
  )


  ############################################################
  # 05 — ROCKSDB MEMTABLES
  ############################################################


  or
  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
        (kafka_stream_state_size_all_mem_tables{} * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)")),
        "name", 
        "$1", 
        "instance", 
        "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "07_rocksdb_memtables", "", ""
  )


  ############################################################
  # 06 — UNMAPPED PAGE CACHE
  ############################################################

  or

  label_replace(
    (
      container_memory_bytes{key="file", id=~"^[a-f0-9]{64}$", project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}
      - ignoring(key)
        container_memory_bytes{key="file_mapped", id=~"^[a-f0-9]{64}$", project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}
    ),
    "component", "08_unmapped_page_cache", "", ""
  )

)

sum by (name, component) (

  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
          jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap"}
             * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"),
          "name", 
          "$1", 
          "instance", 
          "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "01_jvm_heap_used", "", ""
  )

  or

  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
          (jvm_memory_committed_bytes{area="heap"} - jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap"})
             * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"),
          "name",
          "$1",
          "instance",
          "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "02_jvm_heap_free", "", ""
  )

  or 

  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
          jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap"}
             * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"),
          "name", 
          "$1", 
          "instance", 
          "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "03_jvm_nonheap_used", "", ""
  )

  or

  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
          (jvm_memory_committed_bytes{area="nonheap"} - jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap"})
             * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"),
          "name",
          "$1",
          "instance",
          "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "04_jvm_nonheap_free", "", ""
  )



  ############################################################
  # 03 — ROCKSDB BLOCK CACHE
  ############################################################

  or
  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
        (rocksdb_shared_cache_block_cache_usage{} * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)")),
        "name", 
        "$1", 
        "instance", 
        "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "05_rocksdb_block_cache", "", ""
  )

  ############################################################
  # 04 — ROCKSDB INDEX/FILTER
  ############################################################

  or
  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
        (kafka_stream_state_estimate_table_readers_mem{} * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)")),
        "name", 
        "$1", 
        "instance", 
        "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "06_rocksdb_index_filter", "", ""
  )


  ############################################################
  # 05 — ROCKSDB MEMTABLES
  ############################################################


  or
  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
        (kafka_stream_state_size_all_mem_tables{} * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)")),
        "name", 
        "$1", 
        "instance", 
        "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "07_rocksdb_memtables", "", ""
  )


  ############################################################
  # 06 — UNMAPPED PAGE CACHE
  ############################################################

  or

  label_replace(
    (
      container_memory_bytes{key="file", id=~"^[a-f0-9]{64}$", project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}
      - ignoring(key)
        container_memory_bytes{key="file_mapped", id=~"^[a-f0-9]{64}$", project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}
    ),
    "component", "08_unmapped_page_cache", "", ""
  )

  or 

  label_replace(
    (
      label_replace(
          (java_lang_threading_threadcount{} * 1048576)
             * on (instance) group_left(name) label_replace(container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"),
          "name", 
          "$1", 
          "instance", 
          "(.*)")
    ),
    "component", "13_jvm_thread_est", "", ""
  )

)
